results.title: Is it secure to upload files from client side to Azure blob storage? - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: I have a React Application and server hosted in Azure. I want to upload user files to Azure Blob Storage which I was thinking of doing from the server side but it requires using multer and I find the process to be not so efficient because of data relay. I want to upload user files to Azure Blob Storage which I was thinking of doing from the server.

descriptions.content: I have a React Application and server hosted in Azure. I want to upload user files to Azure Blob Storage which I was thinking of doing from the server side but it requires using multer and I find the process to be not so efficient because of data relay. I want to upload user files to Azure Blob Storage which I was thinking of doing from the server.

results.title: 使用Azure函数应用作为POSTAPI，文件始终无法被写入数组中，也没法被multer读取 - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: 我尝试了multer，req，fs，结果都一样，要么返回没有文件，要么显示req.pipe is not a function 我检查到眼花也没看出来问题，是函数方程不能拿来做这个吗？. POSTMAN配置也检查了很多遍，get和postkey都很顺畅，只有文件无法post help me，please~. 我尝试了multer，req，fs，结果都一样，要么返回没有文件，要么显示req.pipe is not a function 我检查到眼花也没看出来问题，是函数方程不能拿来做这个吗？. POSTMAN配置也检查了很多遍，get和postkey都很顺畅，只有文件无法post help me，please~. /answers/questions/1462407/azure-post...

results.title: 400 on image upload in bot framework emulator - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: When I upload the image hit never reaches to my BotController. what is the issue the error say { "error": { } }| Hello amit basu , I understand you are encountering a with the specific error when uploading a... Ensure that the file containing that code has this line at the very top:   JavaScript 2: Check Custom Middleware If you are.
